title: Relates to liability of owners of illegal rentals if a resident or certain other person is injured or dies related to such owner's negligent maintenance
summary: Relates to liability of owners of illegal rentals if a resident or certain other person is injured or dies related to such owner's negligent maintenance of such illegal rental.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the penal law, in relation to liability of owners of illegal rentals if a resident or certain other person is injured or dies related to such owner's negligent maintenance of such illegal rental
